```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
```


## Import data from Excel

```{r}
cnames <- read_excel("Data/Raw/VER99G12.xlsx", 
                     sheet = "14C.data", 
                     skip = 2, 
                     n_max = 0) %>% 
    names()

units <- read_excel("Data/Raw/VER99G12.xlsx", 
                    sheet = "14C.data", 
                    skip = 3, 
                    col_names = cnames,
                    n_max = 1)

datasheet <- read_excel("Data/Raw/VER99G12.xlsx", 
                    sheet = "14C.data", 
                    skip = 4, 
                    col_names = cnames
                    )

```
